comment: So now you've dragged me into your delusion since I identified your "beamer" as a Ford Fiesta. Do everyone a favor and tell your doctor that the TV is talking to you. He will help you.
amr:
# ::snt So now you've dragged me into your delusion since I identified your "beamer" as a Ford Fiesta. Do everyone a favor and tell your doctor that the TV is talking to you. He will help you.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (d / drag-01
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (ii / i)
            :ARG2 (d2 / delude-01
                  :ARG1 y)
            :time (n / now)
            :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (ii2 / identify-01
                        :ARG0 ii
                        :ARG1 (b / beamer
                              :poss y)
                        :ARG2 (c2 / car-make
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Ford"
                                    :op2 "F Fiesta")))))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (d3 / do-02
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 (y2 / you)
                  :ARG1 (f / favor)
                  :ARG2 (e / everyone))
            :op2 (t / tell-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 y2
                  :ARG1 (t2 / talk-01
                        :ARG0 (t3 / television)
                        :ARG2 y2)
                  :ARG2 (d4 / doctor
                        :poss y2)))
      :snt3 (h / help-01
            :ARG0 d4
            :ARG2 y2))
